medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began 3 days ago as a dull ache localized to the RUQ and R epigastrium, accompanied by fatigue and 1 episode of chills. The pain progressed to a sharp pain 1 day ago. The patient tolerated normal oral intake but then had 3 episodes of non-bloody emesis. Last bowel movement was 2 days ago, non-bloody and well-formed. Pain is now well-controlled on morphine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: PUD well-controlled on Prilosec; past surgical history includes open left salpingo-oophorectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Brother has PUD; otherwise no significant family history specified.
